meanings.definition: A boy who sells or delivers newspapers.
meanings.sent1: The newsboys shouted the headlines on the street corner.
meanings.sent2: I saw a newsboy riding his bike while tossing newspapers.
meanings.sent3: The newsboys raced each other to see who could deliver the papers first.
meanings.sent4: The newsboys were like little messengers spreading information across the town.
meanings.sent5: The newsboys wore caps and carried bags full of newspapers.

meanings.definition: A group of boys who sell or deliver newspapers.
meanings.sent1: The newsboys gathered at the newspaper stand early in the morning.
meanings.sent2: My brother joined a group of newsboys to earn some extra money.
meanings.sent3: The newsboys formed a team to compete in a paper delivery challenge.
meanings.sent4: The newsboys marched down the street in a line, each carrying a stack of newspapers.
meanings.sent5: The newsboys chatted and laughed as they walked through the neighborhood selling papers.
